reviewText: Great price, fast shipping. Arrived in perfect condition. Thank you

Body Flex itself is a great unit, I have one, got one for a friend and she use it just about every day very tone mature women, tried getting her another one because band has been over used but a Amazone Sender only sent me half a bar

Body Flex sounds kind of weird and I was really skeptical when I bought it. How can you do deep breathing exercises and lose inches? But it's totally TRUE! I have some health problems and my medical issues plus medications were making weight loss so difficult for me. I was doing everything, dieting, personal trainer, lots of cardio and I was stuck for 6 months. Out of desperation I ordered Body Flex in the middle of the night.

Her old infomercial used to say that you were guaranteed to lose 4 to 14 inches (from a total of 6 measurement spots) in the first week. I figured it was hogwash but gave it a try.

At the end of the week, my pants felt looser so I measured. I couldn't believe it. I had lost 7 inches.

I kept doing it and lost a total of 33 inches over the course of just a couple of months. I did keep up my same dieting and workouts and added Body Flex. I do think you need extra exercise in addition to this if you really want to be fit, but her breathing exercises DO burn the fat off.
